Title: Episode Two
Plot:
Simon is becoming jealous of JP, ignorantly thinking that all the girls are after him. When JP suggests that they try another pub, Simon gets angry and regretfully asks Bob down the local pub, leaving everyone else to try a karaoke bar. Kurt can't seem to get the message across to Carol in a nice way so he asks for Penny's help. She agrees to pretend to be his girlfriend in order to repel Carol.
Later at the karaoke bar, Carol arrives and performs 'Never Gonna Give You Up' for Kurt, just as Penn
